h2_title: Black Myth: Wukong Medicine Ingredients Locations
h1_content:
Medicine Ingredients are one of the most plentiful resources in Black Myth: Wukong. The game is filled with them across the different areas and chapters They are vital for crafting new Consumable Items or stockpiling them to give you an edge in boss battles and tough fights.
In addition to ingredients, you can also find formulas to craft new consumable items and seeds to grow materials. Both of these types of Medicine Ingredients are rarer, so you will have to hunt them down using this guide and our walkthrough.
h2_content:
Below you can find a breakdown of all the Medicine Ingredients in Black Myth: Wukong and where they can be found.
Image | Medicine Ingredient | Rarity | Type | Location
---|---|---|---|---
| Purple Lingzhi | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Black Wind Mountain and onwards Bought from the Shrine store after saving the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain
| Nine-Capped Lingzhi | Rare | Ingredient | Randomly obtained from Purple Lingzhi plants Defeat Lingzhiling enemies
| Gentian | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Black Wind Mountain and onwards Bought from the Shrine store after saving the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain
| Jade Lotus | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Black Wind Mountain and onwards Bought from the Shrine store after saving the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain
| Aged Ginseng | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Black Wind Mountain and onwards (is a small thin plant) Bought from the Shrine store after saving the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain
| Millenium Ginseng | Rare | Ingredient | Randomly obtained from collecting Aged Ginseng
| Licorice | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Yellow Wind Ridge and onwards
| Fragrant Jade Flower | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Yellow Wind Ridge and onwards
| Snake-Head Mushroom | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Black Wind Mountain and onwards Bought from the Shrine store after saving the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain
| Monkey-Head Fungus | Rare | Ingredient | Randomly obtained from Snake-Head Mushrooms
| Fire Bellflower | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Sandgate Village - Valley of Despair and in Yellow Wind Ridge, and onwards
| Celestial Pear | Rare | Ingredient | Found in Snowhill Path - Mirrormere from Celestial Pear trees in The New West and onwards
| Tree Pearl | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in Pagoda Realm - Outside The Wheel in The New West and onwards
| Golden Lotus | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found From Golden Lotus Guai in Bitter Lake - Turtle Island in The New West and onwards
| Withered Silkworm | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found From Golden Lotus Guai in Bitter Lake - Turtle Island in The New West and onwards
| Fire Date | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in The Webbed Hollow and onwards
| Flame Ore | Uncommon | Ingredient | Found in the Flaming Mountains from defeating Flamlings Purchased from the Shrine Store
| Evil Repelling Medicament | Uncommon | Formula | Formula bought from the Shrine store after saving the Shen Monkey Vendor in Black Wind Mountain from Lan-Li-Guhh-Baw")
| Longevity Decoction | Rare | Formula | Formula bought from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after finishing Chapter 1 - Black Wind Mountain
| Tonifying Decoction | Rare | Formula | Formula bought from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after finishing Chapter 2 - Yellow Wind Ridge
| Enhanced Tiger Subduing Pellets | Epic | Formula | Formula found in Bitter Lake in The New West by The Percept Corridor Shrine, straight ahead in the box on the table
| Fortifying Medicament | Rare | Formula | Formula found during Chen Loong's questline after beating him and talking with Xu Dog upon being requested to by Chen Loong
| Body-Fleeting Powder | Epic | Formula | Formula found in Temple Entrance in New Thunderclap Temple in The New West past a small wooden bridge in a box in the building ahead from the Shrine
| Essence Decoction | Rare | Formula | Formula bought from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after finishing Chapter 3 - The New West
| Enhanced Ginseng Pellets | Legendary | Formula | Formula found in The Webbed Hollow at The Verdure Bridge Shrine, towards the lanters and in the room to the right (inside the chests)
| Mirage Pill | Epic | Formula | Formula found in The Verdure Bridge in The Webbed Hollow, past the Scorpion Prince and up the hill inside a golden box
| Life-Saving Pill | Epic | Formula | Formula found in Petalfall Hamlet in Purple Cloud Mountain in The Webbed Hollow across the stone bridge in a container in the house
| Loong Aura Amplification Pellets | Legendary | Formula | Formula bought from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar after finishing Chapter 4 - The Webbed Hollow
| Septenary Heartfire Pill | Legendary | Formula | Formula obtained from Bishui Cave in Flaming Mountains in a large chest to the right of the second group of bulls
| Ascension Powder | Legendary | Formula | Formula obtained from defeating Supreme Celestial Inspector in Mount Huaguo
| Soul Remigration Pill | Mythical | Formula | Formula bought from Xu Dog in the Crouching Tiger Temple - Cellar in New Game Plus
| Gentian Seeds | Uncommon | Seed | Randomly obtained from collecting Gentian
| Jade Lotus Seeds | Uncommon | Seed | Randomly obtained from collecting Jade Lotus
| Licorice Seeds | Uncommon | Seed | Randomly obtained from collecting Licorice
| Fragrant Jade Flower Seeds | Uncommon | Seed | Randomly obtained from collecting a Fragrant Jade Flower
| Fire Bellflower Seeds | Uncommon | Seed | Randomly obtained from collecting a Fire Bellflower
| Celestial Pear Seeds | Rare | Seed | Randomly obtained from collecting Celestial Pears
| Pearl Tree Seeds | Uncommon | Seed | Randomly obtained from collecting Tree Pearls
| Golden Lotus Seeds | Uncommon | Seed | Randomly obtained while defeating Golden Lotus Guai
| Fire Date Seeds | Rare | Seed | Randomly obtained from collecting Fire Dates
| Millennium Ginseng Seeds | Rare | Seed | Obtained upon defeating Old Ginseng Guai
| Monkey-Head Fungus Seeds | Rare | Seed | Obtained upon defeating Fungiworm")
| Nine-Capped Lingzhi Seeds | Rare | Seed | Obtained upon defeating Nine-Capped Lingzhi Guai
